name: Phoenix Dust
description:
Phoenix Dust is a 3D story-driven Action-RPG set in a fantasy world, Delia. Dive in and experience the Story of Rion, the last of the Phoenix Born on a journey to become a Phoenix Mage and save his sister from evil.







In the year 1132, The world of Delia had prospered in harmony when the three principal kingdoms of Kalvurn, Jinta, and Holmengar signed a peace treaty to end all wars and unite under the treaty of Hinserta. They came together to fight a much greater threat called The Darkness. Eventually failing in their quests to destroy the Darkness the world fell into despair. The story begins 28 years after the Darkness has control over the realms and puts you in the shoes of Rion.













  • A unique aesthetic involving stylized art.

  • A different take on third-person perspective with a camera angle similar to an isometric game.

  • Fluid controls rewarding patient plays and careful engagements.

  • Combat includes a mix of weapons and magic and dodging mechanics.

  • A number of difficult bosses that have their own unique attack patterns and affinities to different elements.

  • Utilize both offensive and defensive gear as your weapon of choice.

  • Prestige system in the world rewarding plyers for helping people in the world.
